prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Guitar, Drums, Pipe, Strings, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This composition features Piano, Bass, Guitar, Drums, Pipe, Strings - but no Reed.

Style 2:
This piece is comprised of Piano, Bass, Guitar, Drums, Pipe, Strings - Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This song is Piano, Bass, Guitar, Drums, Pipe, Strings - Reed is not included.
